Indian Economy.title: UN reimposes ‘snapback’ sanctions, including arms embargo on Iran
Indian Economy.summary: The sanctions on Iran have been reimposed via a mechanism known as “snapback” which was included in the 2015 nuclear deal signed between Iran and the world powers.

Indian Economy.title: RBI policy pause likely as trade, tariff uncertainties cloud growth outlook
Indian Economy.summary: With GDP growth estimated at around 6.5% for FY26, the central bank may not need further rate cuts. However, if America's steep 50% tariff persists for long, and growth outlook worsens, the central bank could consider a rate cut later during the year.

Indian Economy.title: Behind the rise and rise of SME IPOs on BSE

Stock Market.title: Domestic muscle shielding India from global shocks: Union AMC's Patwardhan
Stock Market.summary: The Indian market is now significantly more resilient to global shocks and foreign portfolio outflows, thanks to a sharp rise in domestic institutional investors (DIIs) that have offset FII selling and reduced market volatility

Startups & Funding.summary: Peak XV and Tiger Global-backed Pristyn Care has big plans to expand its hospital footprint, months after securing bridge funding from existing investors. However, the deepening leadership crisis and business changes present a grim picture.
